item.title: How Tesla’s metamorphosis may see its stock surge to $3,000 in just 10 years
item.description: Robots and robotaxis will turn Musk’s carmaker into a ‘physical AI’ company, says Baird

item.title: I’m 88 and leaving my $450,000 estate to my son because he has children. Is that wrong?
item.description: “My other children have relationships, but they are unmarried and have no children.”

item.title: ‘I am highly alarmed by the proposed changes to retirement accounts’: I don’t want bitcoin or private equity in my 401(k). What can I do?
item.description: “What are the options for safeguarding my autonomy over my funds?”

item.title: ‘I cannot plan a life with all the uncertainties’: My boyfriend, 54, has $90,000 in credit-card debt. Is this a dealbreaker?
item.description: “I’m on track to retire in 10 years.”

item.title: My husband and I are 64. My in-laws are leaving us a $250K house. What do we do with the money?
item.description: “My in-laws are 95. They have a low income and do not file taxes.”
